title: Bloomberg Markets: Weitz on Fulfillment and Customer Care Jobs
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Weitz on Fulfillment and Customer Care Jobs
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Stefan Weitz\u0010Chief Technology Officer\u0010Radial\u0010Discussing 27,000 new fulfillment and customer care jobs nationwide this fall, to power the expected surge in eCommerce shopping this holiday season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
